alert.note: Alert for Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 1:35AM MST until March 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow ongoing. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...North Park, and Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet. * WHEN...The heaviest snow will come to an end early this morning, with rapidly improving conditions thereafter. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and hazardous travel. Visibility will be reduced in heavy snow and areas of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Grand and Summit Counties Below 9000 Feet; Jackson County Below 9000 Feet
